data.content: Implemented OpenRouter support: API client (src/lib/openrouter.ts) with model listing and key validation, settings schema with apiKey+enabled fields, API routes (/api/openrouter/models and /api/openrouter/validate), settings UI section with toggle, API key input with validation, and filterable model browser showing name/context/costs. Added vendor detection (openrouter) and agent info bar config (orange Globe icon). All quality gates pass: 0 lint errors, clean typecheck, 807 tests passing.
